movies.title: Joker
movies.description: A dark portrayal of Arthur Fleck, an aspiring comedian whose mental breakdown leads to the rise of the iconic villain Joker.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household by posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: A depressed man suffering from insomnia meets a strange soap salesman and soon finds himself in an underground fight club.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: A U.S Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility on Shutter Island after one of the patients goes missing.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: A group of Jewish soldiers are on an undercover mission to assassinate Nazi leaders in Nazi-occupied France during WWII.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime, as he faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on plunging Gotham into anarchy.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A young hobbit, Frodo, has been entrusted with an ancient ring. Now he must embark on an epic quest to the Cracks of Doom to destroy it.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of the founding of Facebook, from its beginnings in a Harvard dorm room to its worldwide success.
